name: Red Feather Fan
title: Ineffable Breeze: Red Feather Fan
desc: Legend has it that this fan is capable of unleashing various effects in the hands of a tengu warrior.\nBut in the hands of an ordinary person, it only possesses the power to "make one's body lighter."\nEven so, this degree of power is more than useful for the average individual.

skills.desc: After you switch characters: The next Switch Character action you perform this Round will be considered a Fast Action instead of a Combat Action. It will also cost 1 fewer Elemental Die. (Once per Round)
